mapper.insert: insert into tb_examination_paper(examination_paper_id, patient_id, report_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{examinationPaperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select count(0) from tb_examination_paper where examination_paper_id = #{examinationPaperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select examination_paper_id as examinationPaperId, tep.paper_id as patientId, tep.report_id as reportId from tb_examination_paper tep left join tb_patient tpi on tep.patient_id = tpi.patient_id -- left join tb_scale_paper tsp on tsp.paper_id = tep.examination_paper_id
and tep.examination_paper_id=#{examinationPaperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and tpi.doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select tep.examination_paper_id as examinationPaperId, tsi.scale_id as scaleId, tsi.scale_name as scaleName, tpi.patient_name as patientName, tsp.use_time as useTime, tsi.question_count as questionCount, tsp.create_time as examinationDate, tj.check_user as checkUser, tsp.judge_status as judgeStatus, tj.total_score as totalScore, from tb_examination_paper tep left join tb_patient tpi on tep.patient_id = tpi.patient_id left join tb_scale_paper tsp on tsp.paper_id = tep.examination_paper_id left join tb_scale tsi on tsp.scale_id = tsi.scale_id left join tb_judge tj on tsp.scale_paper_id = tj.scale_paper_id where tep.examination_paper_id = #{examinationPaperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and tpi.doctor_id=#{doctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select tep.examination_paper_id from tb_examination_paper tep left join tb_patient tpi on tep.patient_id = tpi.patient_id where tpi.doctor_id=#{doctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_scale_paper(scale_paper_id, paper_id, scale_id, use_time, judge_status, create_time, update_time) values (#{scalePaperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scaleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{judgeStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select tsp.scale_paper_id as scalePaperId, tsp.paper_id as examinationPaperId, ts.scale_id as scaleId, ts.scale_name as scaleName, tsp.use_time as useTime, tsp.judge_status as judgeStatus, tsp.create_time as createTime from tb_scale_paper tsp left join tb_examination_paper tep on tsp.paper_id = tep.examination_paper_id left join tb_scale ts on tsp.scale_id = ts.scale_id where tsp.paper_id = #{examinationPaperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select scale_paper_id as scalePaperId, paper_id as paperId, scale_id scaleId, use_time as useTime, judge_status as judgeStatus, create_time as createTime from tb_scale_paper where scale_paper_id =#{scalePaperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select tsp.scale_paper_id as scalePaperId, tsp.scale_id as scaleId, ts.scale_name as scaleName, tq.question_id as questionId, tq.title as title, tq.items as items, tq.attachment as attachment, tq.record_score as recordScore, tq.group_type as groupType, tq.display as display, ta.content as content, ta.score as score from tb_scale_paper tsp left join tb_scale ts on ts.scale_id = tsp.scale_id left join tb_answer ta on tsp.scale_paper_id = ta.scale_paper_id left join tb_question tq on tq.question_id = ta.question_id where scale_paper_id = #{scalePaperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
